nodes.text: Krillcrab were a type of crustacean whose meat could be eaten. When the junk dealer Temmin Wexley saw the pale flesh of an Uugteen's limbs through the joints in its armor on the planet Akiva shortly before the Rebellion on Akiva, it reminded him of the flesh of a krillcrab that had been flipped over so that its meat was accessible.
Krillcrab were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
